meanings.sent1: The cruel mutilator harmed the poor animal.
meanings.sent2: The authorities caught the mutilator red-handed.
meanings.sent3: The clumsy mutilator accidentally cut his own finger.
meanings.sent4: The dark shadow of the mutilator loomed over the town.
meanings.sent5: The sinister grin of the mutilator sent shivers down everyone's spine.

meanings.definition: To maim or disfigure by removing or irreparably damaging parts of the body.
meanings.sent1: Do not mutilate the beautiful painting with unnecessary alterations.
meanings.sent2: The vandals tried to mutilate the statue in the park.
meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally mutilated the cake while trying to decorate it.
meanings.sent4: The storm's fury seemed to mutilate the once peaceful landscape.
meanings.sent5: The harsh words spoken in anger can mutilate relationships beyond repair.
